title: Did General Douglas MacArthur sign an interplanetary war?
subtitle: The WWII symbol indicated that humanity may one day face an enemy from outside the Earth.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: During the 1955 speech in West Point, General Douglas MacArthur said to the assembled students: "The coming war will be an interplanetary war. Earth nations must one day be a common front against attack by people from other planets."
